author: Special Correspondent
text:
Miscreants hurled a Molotov Cocktail at the house of Tiruvarur district general secretary of the BJP on Sunday night.

T.R. Ganesan (42) of Bamini Ne Street, Tiruthuraipoondi, escaped unhurt as he had just entered his house from the front yard when the bottle with fire and petrol came crashing near the residence. Head constable Kanagaraj deputed full time to protect Ganesan, along with others, rushed out to nab the culprits who escaped under the cover of darkness. No one was injured. However, Tiruvarur Superintendent of Police Jeyachandran and Tiruthuraipoondi Deputy Superintendent of Police Kannadasan inspected the spot and directed the police to intensify the efforts to nab the culprits.
title: BJP functionary attacked
